Posts.Content: i m 21 yr old student. from past 5 years Â i suspected a small knot, shape of a pea (round) which was being treated by my uncle through homeopathic treatment. now its size has decreased , i mean i feel that it has reduced but now from past 1 month i feel itching near ma nipples. could it be because of sweat or skin allergy also i have pain in ma right breast(which has the knot) when i press it.( which i noticed today) could it be because of gym exercise which i started a week before could this knot be just a fibro? please guide me as sooon as possible i m realy tensed and scared waiting for a reply rushna s 21yrs INDIAN resident
Posts.Title: query
